articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.title: WeightWatchers files for bankruptcy - CNN
articles.description: Weight Watchers, the 61-year-old program that revolutionized dieting for millions of Americans, has filed for bankruptcy.
articles.content:
WeightWatchers, the 62-year-old program that revolutionized dieting for millions of people around the world, has filed for bankruptcy.
The company announced Tuesday it has entered Chapter 11, which … [+2889 chars]
